introduction_text_1: Fullstack developer, 20 years old, I'm studying Computer Engineering at UnB.
introduction_text_2: I am looking for learning opportunities.
introduction_text_3: I started learning at the junior company Struct, mainly in web development, I studied and applied web and mobile development at the VLGI company and I keep looking for opportunities to improve myself every day.
form_email_validation: Please enter a valid email address
form_success_text: Your email has been successfully sent to me, thank you very much for contacting me
form_error_text: An error occurred, I apologize for the inconvenience. I have other means of contact in the footer of the site if necessary
about_history_text: I joined UnB for the computer engineering course in 2020, where, due to the pause due to the pandemic, I started to learn web development together with the company Júnior Struct. I developed mainly in Ruby on rails and in React, taking on several projects and even some leaders. I studied with different courses, but I learned more with practice, and finally I entered the internship at the company VLGI, in the area of ​​mobile development, but also working in web development with the main stack of svelte (front-end), jest (tests) and strapi (back-end).
about_history_text_2: My last experience was leading the front-end of a project by the company TMTecnologia, on a part-time basis with a team, in the 'Labfaz' project
